title: Admin Section UI Finalization & Backend Connectivity
description: Complete audit and finalization of all admin pages. Ensure every component works, all backend data is connected, and all functionality is properly implemented.

subtasks.title: Admin Section Audit & Documentation
subtasks.description: Comprehensive audit of all admin pages to catalog what exists, what works, and what needs fixing
subtasks: Catalog all admin pages and routes
Document each page's purpose and functionality
List all components on each page
Identify data sources and API endpoints
Note any obvious bugs or issues

subtasks.title: Dashboard Page Finalization
subtasks.description: Ensure admin dashboard loads correctly, displays accurate data, and all widgets work

subtasks.title: Products Management Finalization
subtasks.description: Complete products CRUD functionality with proper backend connectivity
subtasks: Check all validation and error messages

subtasks.title: Orders Management Finalization
subtasks.description: Complete orders CRUD with proper filtering, search, and status management

subtasks.title: Customers Management Finalization
subtasks.description: Complete customer management with search, filtering, and order history

subtasks.title: Content/Pages Management Finalization
subtasks.description: Finalize content management system for pages, blogs, and other content
subtasks: Test page editing with rich text

subtasks.title: Settings Page Finalization
subtasks.description: Complete all settings pages with proper validation and persistence

subtasks.title: Analytics/Reports Finalization
subtasks.description: Complete analytics pages with accurate data and proper visualizations

subtasks.title: API Endpoints Verification
subtasks.description: Verify all admin API endpoints work correctly and handle errors
subtasks: Test all GET endpoints return correct data
Test all POST endpoints create data correctly
Test all PUT/PATCH endpoints update data
Test all DELETE endpoints remove data
Test validation errors return helpful messages

subtasks.title: Error Handling & Loading States
subtasks.description: Ensure proper error handling and loading states throughout admin
subtasks: Verify all forms show loading states during submission
Test retry mechanisms for failed requests

subtasks.title: Responsive Design Verification
subtasks.description: Test and fix responsive design on all admin pages
subtasks: Fix tables for mobile (horizontal scroll or cards)

subtasks.title: Performance Optimization
subtasks.description: Optimize admin pages for fast loading and smooth interactions
subtasks: Add loading skeletons for perceived performance

success_criteria: Every admin page loads without console errors
All data displays correctly from backend
All forms submit and save data successfully
All tables load, filter, sort, and paginate correctly
All CRUD operations work (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
Loading states show on all async operations
Error messages display clearly for all failure cases
Responsive layout works on mobile, tablet, and desktop
All functionality is documented for future maintenance
definition_of_done: All admin pages audited and tested
All bugs fixed and functionality working
Backend API verified for all operations
Responsive design working on all pages
Ready for handoff or production use
